cloudlatex.config.enabled: Set true if enable cloudlatex plugin in this project.
cloudlatex.config.projectId: ProjectId. *Do not mistake this value, otherwise your files might be overwritten.
cloudlatex.config.autoCompile: Set true if automatically compile when any files are saved.
cloudlatex.config.supressIcon: Set true to hide cloudlatex icon on the activity bar in the unactivated project.
cloudlatex.config.endpoint: API endpoint. *Do not edit this value under normal usage.
cloudlatex.viewsWelcome.noWorkspace:
In order to start to use CloudLaTeX extension, you need to create empty folder and open it.
[Open Folder](command:vscode.openFolder)
To learn more about the extension, read document: 
[EN](https://github.com/cloudlatex-team/cloudlatex-vscode-extension#setting) [日本語](https://github.com/cloudlatex-team/cloudlatex-vscode-extension/blob/main/docs/README_ja.md#%E6%BA%96%E5%82%99).
